Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.09.2014 JH SCR19122 Set V.ACTUALFINANCEEXCL = 0 if the calculation < 0
19.08.2014 GB SCR19053 Does the debtor have an external guarantee?: chnaged calculation for V.ACTUALFINANCEEXCL
31.07.2014 GB SCR19025 Extended test for call step 5, changed calc of sum(DREX_TOTALREFLIMEXCEEDED) in step 6
16.05.2014 GB SCR18901 Step:2/5: Changed calculation for DREX_EXPORTLC, DREX_EXTERNALGUARANTEE, Step 6: Extended condiotion for
set CMON_FINANCEABOVEREFLIM, CMON_CLIENTBALANCEREFLIM
01.05.2014 GB SCR18835 Step2: Extended selection with DEBC_EXPORTLC = 'N' and DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE = 'N'
16.01.2014 SH SCR18624 Step4 Changed update V.BOTTOM2 (via GSBU_ID= 2081,2082,2083 depending on the financecode)
06.09.2013 SH SCR18402 Step4 Changed GB418.PI.LEVEL = 2 to 4
22.08.2013 SH SCR18363 Step2 part1: Added test ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = N to select debtors
14.03.2012 SH SCR17195 Step2/5 Replaced CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO/CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO by
04.03.2012 GB SCR17171 Changed condition for the test The debtor is selected if . . .
01.03.2012 GB SCR17171 Changed condition for update the V.BOTTOMH (step 4)
29.11.2011 SH SCR16784 Step2: Changed tests on DEBH fields to use from proper debtor, in case of
DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH > 0 from legal owner else from individual debtor
09.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Repalced CURR by CURA (in DSQL)
14.04.2011 SH SCR16386 Step7 Fixed bg in CMON selection to write MQ128
28.03.2011 JOH SCR16306 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and
GB002 by GB902 ; Step 3 changed hardcoded test on EUR by ADMN_CURRENCY in DSQL
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
04.11.2009 SH SCR15018 Step3 Added substration "sum (DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) < 0"
to determine v.ACTUALFINANCE
23.09.2009 SH SCR14926 Step3 Part 1 Added test or DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT = 0 or > 0
SQL delete

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO as ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO as CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end as DEBTOR, min(CLNT109_ATT_CURR),min(CLNT108_ACC_CURR) , min(CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL), min(CLNT407_FINANCECODE), min(CLNT411_MINFINANCELIMIT), min(CLNT203_OFFICE), min(CLNT804_RISKRATING), min(B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY), min(B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT), min(CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK), min(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT), min(CCRY501_REINSCLNT_INFS_CODE), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal(13,2)), case when min(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT) is not null and min(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT) = 0 then 0 when max(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) > 0 then cast(max(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (13,2)) when min(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) is not null and min(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) = 0 then 0 when max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) > 0 then cast(max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) / min(REIN.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) * min(REOUT.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) as decimal(13,2)) when max(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT) > 0 then cast(max(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT) / min(SJIN.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) * min(SJOUT.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) as decimal(13,2)) when min(CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK) = 'N' and min(CCRY501_REINSCLNT_INFS_CODE) = '' then cast(max(B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT) as decimal(13,2)) else 0 end as LIMIT from :1/debc join :1/CLNT on CLNT407_FINANCECODE in ('A','B','C') and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH A on A.DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH join :1/DEBH B on B.DEBH_NO = case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end and B.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1 and B.DEBH_NO > 2 join :1/CCRY on CCRY308_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY308_COUNTRY = B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY left outer join :1/CURA REIN on REIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REIN.CURA_CODE = DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR left outer join :1/CURA REOUT on REOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY left outer join :1/CURA SJIN on SJIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJIN.CURA_CODE = CLNT109_ATT_CURR left outer join :1/CURA SJOUT on SJOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and (DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT = 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM = 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT = 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT > 0) group by CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end order by CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end for fetch only

Text.val: -- check if DEBC_EXPORTLC = Y in one of the selected debtors
-- check if DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE = Y in one of the selected debtors
-- Does the debtor have an external guarantee?
-- If GSBU_YESNO(2098) <> Y then set V.ACTUALFINANCEEXCL = V.ACTUALFINANCE and go to step 5
-- If (DEBC_EXPORTLC = N and DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE = N)
-- If DEBC_AMOUNT_EXTGUARANTEE = 0
V.ACTUALFINANCEEXCL = V.LIMIT
V.ACTUALFINANCEEXCL = V.ACTUALFINANCE V.AMOUNT_EXTGUARANTEE
-- Set/Reset variables
-- Info: Most of the rough debtor selection (calc v:LIMIT) is done via DSQL to
speed up performance. Instead of using GB902 for currency recalculation they are
immediately done via DSQL (No support of opposite exchange rate calculations)
-- Test if debtor is selected

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/debc join :1/CLNT on CLNT407_FINANCECODE in ('A','B','C') and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH A on A.DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH join :1/DEBH B on B.DEBH_NO = case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end and B.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1 and B.DEBH_NO > 2 join :1/CCRY on CCRY308_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY308_COUNTRY = B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY left outer join :1/CURA REIN on REIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REIN.CURA_CODE = DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR left outer join :1/CURA REOUT on REOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY left outer join :1/CURA SJIN on SJIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJIN.CURA_CODE = CLNT109_ATT_CURR left outer join :1/CURA SJOUT on SJOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and (DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT = 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM = 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT = 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT > 0) and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :3 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :4 and case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end = :5 and :2 for fetch only

Text.val: if pi.CounterFor = 1 then DEBC_EXPORTLC = Y
if pi.CounterFor = 2 then DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE = Y

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBC_AMOUNT_EXTGUARANTEE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/debc join :1/CLNT on CLNT407_FINANCECODE in ('A','B','C') and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH A on A.DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH join :1/DEBH B on B.DEBH_NO = case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end and B.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1 and B.DEBH_NO > 2 join :1/CCRY on CCRY308_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY308_COUNTRY = B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY left outer join :1/CURA REIN on REIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REIN.CURA_CODE = DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR left outer join :1/CURA REOUT on REOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY left outer join :1/CURA SJIN on SJIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJIN.CURA_CODE = CLNT109_ATT_CURR left outer join :1/CURA SJOUT on SJOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and (DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT = 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM = 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT = 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT > 0) and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 and case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end = :4 for fetch only
select DREX_ADMNO, DREX_CLNTNO, cast(max(DREX_TOTALCLIENTBALANCEJUR) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DREX group by DREX_ADMNO, DREX_CLNTNO order by DREX_ADMNO, DREX_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- general currency
-- client currency

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DREX_TOTALREFLIMEXCEEDED) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DREX where DREX_ADMNO = :2 and DREX_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Clear MQ128
-- Rebuild CMON
-- Test on CMON_CLIENTBALANCEREFLIM <> 0 to prevent zero divisions
